title: Casket (discontinued)

properties.name: description
properties.value: A casket could previously be received after completing any step of a Treasure Trail. These caskets did not always contain a reward, and sometimes only gave another clue scroll.

content:
Casket (discontinued) was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.

A casket could previously be received after completing any step of a Treasure Trail. These caskets did not always contain a reward, and sometimes only gave another clue scroll.

On 28 July 2016 Treasure Trails were updated. Caskets were replaced with new items called Reward caskets. They are only received once all steps have been completed, and are guaranteed to contain a reward.

Although caskets are no longer obtainable, they are still ingame for any player who had one before the update, making them a rare example of a discontinued item in Old School RuneScape.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
2 July 2015
(update)

A "Check steps" option was added.

6 March 2014
(update | poll)

The item was renamed from "Casket" to "Casket (difficulty)".

[[File:Casket (discontinued) detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''casket''' could previously be received after completing any step of a [[Treasure Trail]]. These caskets did not always contain a reward, and sometimes only gave another clue scroll.

On [[28 July]] [[2016]] Treasure Trails were updated. Caskets were replaced with new items called [[Reward casket]]s. They are only received once all steps have been completed, and are guaranteed to contain a reward. 

Although caskets are no longer obtainable, they are still ingame for any player who had one before the update, making them a rare example of a discontinued item in ''Old School RuneScape''.
